StructureMapModelMode

How the referenced structure is used in this mapping.

This code system http://hl7.org/fhir/map-model-mode defines the following codes:

CodeDisplayDefinition
source Source Structure DefinitionThis structure describes an instance passed to the mapping engine that is used a source of data.
queried Queried Structure DefinitionThis structure describes an instance that the mapping engine may ask for that is used a source of data.
target Target Structure DefinitionThis structure describes an instance passed to the mapping engine that is used a target of data.
produced Produced Structure DefinitionThis structure describes an instance that the mapping engine may ask to create that is used a target of data.

name: StructureMapModelMode
